mapper.insert: INSERT INTO batch_execution_log (job_name, job_execution_id, status, start_time, exit_code, exit_message) VALUES (#{jobName}, #{jobExecutionId}, #{status}, #{startTime}, #{exitCode}, #{exitMessage})

INSERT INTO batch_execution_log (job_name, job_execution_id, step_name, status, start_time, read_count, write_count, commit_count, rollback_count) VALUES (#{jobName}, #{jobExecutionId}, #{stepName}, #{status}, #{startTime}, #{readCount}, #{writeCount}, #{commitCount}, #{rollbackCount})
mapper.update: UPDATE batch_execution_log SET status = #{status}, end_time = #{endTime}, exit_code = #{exitCode}, exit_message = #{exitMessage}, error_message = #{errorMessage} WHERE job_execution_id = #{jobExecutionId} AND step_name IS NULL

UPDATE batch_execution_log SET status = #{status}, end_time = #{endTime}, exit_code = #{exitCode}, exit_message = #{exitMessage}, read_count = #{readCount}, write_count = #{writeCount}, commit_count = #{commitCount}, rollback_count = #{rollbackCount}, error_message = #{errorMessage} WHERE job_execution_id = #{jobExecutionId} AND step_name = #{stepName}
